Innovative Data Technologies Laboratory

Interested in the areas of Data and metadata management, Storage and I/O, File systems, and Energy optimization in the HPC, Cloud, and Edge computing environments.

Latest News

Multiple funded positions opened!

If interested in performing cutting-edge research and development in these areas, please send your CV and transcript to Prof. Byna by email.

Research

IDT lab is interested in the areas of Data and metadata management, Storage and I/O, File systems, and Energy optimization in the HPC, Cloud, and Edge computing environments.
